name: Obscura Animas
description:
Are you bat enough to escape the dungeon?
Use your bat skills and try!

Team

Darrell (Programer and designer)

silverrhills (SFX and Music compositor)

Game Controls

Space/Triangle(PS4):  Transform

Enter/X(PS4); Interact (only human form)
